property.name: shuffle.mode
property.description: workers will only read their own dataset by default, set shuffle mode to true to read from the entire dataset

property.name: read.files.per.thread
property.description: the number of files to read for each thread

property.name: write.files.per.thread
property.description: the number of files to write for each thread

property.name: block.size.bytes
property.description: the block size of a file

property.name: buffer.size.bytes
property.description: the size of the buffer read and write once

property.name: read.type
property.description: the ReadType of the read operation, now only used for AlluxioFS

property.name: write.type
property.description: the WriteType of the write operation, now only used for AlluxioFS
